Class TimeSlot

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable

    public class TimeSlot
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas
    Represents a particular range in time in a single day.
    Since:
    3.2
